name: John Doe
title: CEO
feedback: Vaishnavi Consultancy Services, founded in 2010, is a leading provider of manpower outsourcing, payroll management, and facility support services in India. With a strong presence in 8 states, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner for both government organizations and private sector enterprises.For over a decade, we have been delivering customized workforce solutions that meet the dynamic needs of industries such as healthcare, education, infrastructure, aviation, logistics, manufacturing, hospitality, and corporate offices. Our focus on quality, compliance, and operational efficiency allows our clients to optimize performance while staying focused on their core objectives.
